source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_000<tab>Greetings, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Rest assured, we're working until our muscles can take no more, kupo! Is there anything else you wanted?
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_000<tab>くぽぽー♪
センセイ、モグに何かご用くぽ？

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you ask?
target: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_Q1_000_000<tab>何を聞く？

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_A1_000_001<tab>Tell me about yourself.
target: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_A1_000_001<tab>あなたのことを教えてほしい

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_A1_000_002<tab>What kind of place is this?
target: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_A1_000_002<tab>ここはどんなところだ？

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_A1_000_003<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_A1_000_003<tab>キャンセル

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_010<tab>Why, you know me! I'm Mogzin, master of the Mogmenders, who are in charge of restoring splendor to Zenith!
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_010<tab>くぽ？　モグのことくぽ？
それじゃあ、もう一度自己紹介くぽ！
モグは「モグモグ修復団」の団長、モグジンくぽ！

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_011<tab>We have a long road ahead of us, but there's no harder working group of crafters in all of Moghome, kupo!
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_011<tab>もう知ってると思うけど、「モグモグ修復団」は、
白亜の宮殿修復のために集まったモーグリ族くぽ。
みんな、手先の器用さには自信ありくぽ！

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_012<tab>We obviously still have much to learn, but I'm sure with your help even Chieftain Moglin will be impressed with our skills!
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_012<tab>でも、ヒトに比べたらまだまだへっぽこくぽ。
だから、この広場を修復しつつ、
オヤカタとセンセイに技術指導してもらってるくぽ！

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_020<tab>Bahrr Lehs is a ruin from over a thousand years ago, when landlords and skylords lived in harmony. Its restoration is the Mogmenders' first duty!
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_020<tab>ここは「バール・レス広場」くぽ！
千年前の、ヒトとドラゴンの仲がよかった頃の遺跡で、
いまはモグたち「モグモグ修復団」が修復中くぽ！

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_021<tab>Not long ago, the plaza was buried under a mountain of earth. But one day, a perceptive moogle noticed a piece of the wall jutting out from the soil. After many grueling days of digging, we finally uncovered what you see before you!
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_021<tab>もともとこの広場は、山の中に埋まっていたものくぽ。
それを、壁の一部が土から飛び出してるのを見つけて、
みんなで掘り返したくぽ。

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_022<tab>Although repair of the plaza is sure to be a massive undertaking, the lessons we learn along the way will certainly help us in the future. And so we will work day and night to restore Bahrr Lehs to its former glory!
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_022<tab>掘り起こした直後は、とってもボロボロだったくぽ。
だからこそ、練習台としてはピッタリだったくぽ。
モグたちがこの広場を修復してるのは、そういうわけくぽ！

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_100<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, we are here and ready to serve! No task is too grand, and no question too difficult to answer, kupo!
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_100<tab>これはこれは、センセイくぽ！
やる気いっぱいのモグに、なにかご用くぽ！？

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you ask?
target: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_Q2_000_000<tab>何を聞く？

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_A2_000_001<tab>Tell me about yourself.
target: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_A2_000_001<tab>あなたのことを教えてほしい

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_A2_000_002<tab>What kind of place is this?
target: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_A2_000_002<tab>ここはどんなところだ？

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_A2_000_003<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_A2_000_003<tab>キャンセル

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_110<tab>Why, I'm Mogzin, master of the Mogmenders, and possessed of great will, perseverance, and determination!
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_110<tab>くぽ？　モグのことくぽ？
モグは「モグモグ修復団」の団長、モグジンくぽ！
「意思は岩を砕く」がモットーの職人くぽ！

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_111<tab>Everyone has their part to play in rebuilding the statue demanded by Gullinbursti─even you! We can't waste any time with idle chatter!
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_111<tab>いまは、グリンブルスティさんと約束した、
「友情の証」の石像を修復するために、いろいろ準備中くぽ。
センセイも、ご協力をお願いしますくぽ！

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_120<tab>Bahrr Lehs is a ruin from over a thousand years ago, when landlords and skylords lived in harmony. Its restoration is the Mogmenders' first duty!
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_120<tab>ここは「バール・レス広場」くぽ！
千年前の、ヒトとドラゴンの仲がよかった頃の遺跡で、
いまはモグたち「モグモグ修復団」が修復中くぽ！

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_121<tab>Not long ago, the plaza was buried under a mountain of earth. But one day, a perceptive moogle noticed a piece of the wall jutting out from the soil. After many grueling days of digging, we finally uncovered what you see before you!
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_121<tab>もともとこの広場は、山の中に埋まっていたものくぽ。
それを、壁の一部が土から飛び出してるのを見つけて、
みんなで掘り返したくぽ。

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_122<tab>To think the plaza has changed so much since then. Of course, we wouldn't have been able to do it without your support! I have a feeling we're nearing the end of our work here, and after that we'll move to Zenith proper!
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_122<tab>あの時は、こんなにキレイに修復できるとは思わなかったくぽ。
これはオヤカタとセンセイの指導のおかげくぽ！
最後までやり抜くから、引き続き指導をお願いするくぽ！

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_150<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, these new tools are amazing, kupo! It's hard to imagine how we got along without them! Do you need anything? Make it quick─I can't wait to get back to building!
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_150<tab>くっぽぽー♪　道具を更新した新生モグジンくぽ！
ノリにノッてるこのモグに、センセイは何かご用くぽ？

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_Q5_000_000<tab>What will you ask?
target: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_Q5_000_000<tab>何を聞く？

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_A5_000_001<tab>Tell me about yourself.
target: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_A5_000_001<tab>あなたのことを教えてほしい

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_A5_000_002<tab>What kind of place is this?
target: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_A5_000_002<tab>ここはどんなところだ？

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_A5_000_003<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_A5_000_003<tab>キャンセル

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_160<tab>Mogzin, master of the Mogmenders, at your service! But you already knew that, didn't you? Well, I suppose another round of introductions is in order, because with these tools I feel like a whole new crafter, kupo!
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_160<tab>くぽ？　モグのことくぽ？
モグは「モグモグ修復団」の団長、モグジンくぽ！
道具を更新して、ただいま絶好調の職人くぽ！

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_161<tab>To think all of our worries were solved so easily. We would have never thought it was our tools that were the cause. Perhaps in time, we'll be able to make even better ones!
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_161<tab>あれだけ伸び悩んでいたのが、嘘みたいに解決したくぽ！
やっぱり、センセイとオヤカタはすごいくぽ！
モグも早く、ふたりみたいにすごい道具を作りたいくぽー♪

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_162<tab>For now, we must focus our efforts on the task at hand─Gullinbursti's statue! Come on, we all have our work to do!
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_162<tab>だけど、まずは「友情の証」の石像の修復くぽ。
そのための準備は、ちゃくちゃくと進行中くぽ。
センセイもご協力を、よろしくお願いしますくぽ！

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_200<tab>...Oh, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! My apologies, I was lost in thought. What brings you here today?
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_200<tab>…………あ、センセイくぽ。
ごめんなさい、ちょっと考えごとしてたくぽ。
それで、モグに何かご用くぽ？

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_Q3_000_000<tab>What will you ask?
target: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_Q3_000_000<tab>何を聞く？

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_A3_000_001<tab>Tell me about yourself.
target: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_A3_000_001<tab>あなたのことを教えてほしい

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_A3_000_002<tab>What kind of place is this?
target: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_A3_000_002<tab>ここはどんなところだ？

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_A3_000_003<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_A3_000_003<tab>キャンセル

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_210<tab>Is this some kind of test, kupo? I'm Mogzin, master of the Mogmenders. We've just completed our first official commission: Gullinbursti's statue.
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_210<tab>くぽ？　モグのことくぽ？
モグは「モグモグ修復団」の団長、モグジンくぽ。
「友情の証」の石像を修復し終えて、一区切りついたところくぽ。

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_211<tab>Of course, everyone is taking a well-deserved rest. But I can't stop thinking that something was off about Gullinbursti's reaction. Perhaps I'm just imagining things...
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_211<tab>広場の修復もほとんど終わってるから、
みんな浮かれて、気が抜けてるくぽ。
でも……モグはなんか違う気がするくぽ……。

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_220<tab>Bahrr Lehs is a ruin from over a thousand years ago, when landlords and skylords lived in harmony. Its restoration was the Mogmenders' first duty.
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_220<tab>ここは「バール・レス広場」くぽ。
千年前の、ヒトとドラゴンの仲がよかった頃の遺跡で、
いまはモグたち「モグモグ修復団」が修復中くぽ。

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_221<tab>As you can see, we've more or less completed our task. All that's left is to keep the plaza neat and tidy. Still, something feels off...
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_221<tab>それも、見ての通り、もうそろそろ終わるくぽ。
あとは細かい仕上げを残すだけくぽ……。
でも、本当にこれで終わっていいくぽ……？

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_300<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you're back! I am overjoyed to see you again! What brings you to Bahrr Lehs?
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_300<tab>センセイ、いらっしゃいくぽ！
会いに来てくれて、とっても嬉しいくぽ！

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_Q4_000_000<tab>What will you ask?
target: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_Q4_000_000<tab>何を聞く？

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_A4_000_001<tab>How fare you of late?
target: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_A4_000_001<tab>近況について

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_A4_000_002<tab>What kind of place is this?
target: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_A4_000_002<tab>ここはどんなところだ？

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_A4_000_003<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_A4_000_003<tab>キャンセル

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_310<tab>Gullinbursti not only approves of our work─he has pledged to keep Bahrr Lehs safe for us! I believe it goes without saying our first project was a success!
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_310<tab>「友情の証」も「イタズラ」も、
グリンブルスティさんに認められたくぽ！
この広場は、完璧に修復完了くぽ！

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_311<tab>But the work of the Mogmenders shall continue! From here we move on to Zenith, and from there... Well, who knows how far we'll go!
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_311<tab>でも、モグたち「モグモグ修復団」の挑戦は終わらないくぽ。
次はいよいよ白亜の宮殿の修復くぽ！
「意思は岩を砕く」……必ずやり抜いてみせるくぽ！

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_320<tab>Bahrr Lehs is a ruin from a thousand years past, when landlords and skylords lived in harmony. Its restoration has finally been completed!
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_320<tab>ここは「バール・レス広場」くぽ。
千年前の、ヒトとドラゴンの仲がよかった頃の遺跡で、
モグたち「モグモグ修復団」がキレイに修復した場所くぽ！

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_321<tab>From here, we'll start our work on Zenith. Oh, I can't wait to see what challenges we encounter! Of course, if you ever want to help us again, simply offer and we will gladly accept!
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_321<tab>これからは、この広場を拠点にして、
白亜の宮殿の修復にとりかかるつもりくぽ。
センセイには引き続き、協力と指導をお願いしますくぽ！

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_Q6_000_000<tab>What will you ask?
target: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_Q6_000_000<tab>何を聞く？

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_A6_000_001<tab>How fare you of late?
target: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_A6_000_001<tab>近況について

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_A6_000_002<tab>What manner of place is this?
target: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_A6_000_002<tab>ここはどんなところだ？

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_A6_000_003<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_A6_000_003<tab>キャンセル

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_410<tab>How kind of you to ask, kupo! Ever since Gullinbursti came back to us as his gentle and helpful self, everything's been right as rain. My only complaint is that Ohl Deeh's constant roaring has left me with a terrible headache. You don't think you could talk to him about that, could you?
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_410<tab>グリンブルスティさんが、無事に戻ってきて一安心くぽ。
オル・ディーは、事あるごとに竜の咆哮を放っていて、
ちょーっと、うるさいくぽ……。

source: TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_411<tab>More importantly, the restoration of Zenith is well-nigh complete, kupo! And needless to say, we couldn't have done it without the knowledge and aid of our new friends, the Vath and the Gundu. Just you wait for it, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─we'll show our thanks by building something that will have the whole realm standing in awe and astonishment!
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2MOGZIN_00360_MOGZIN_000_411<tab>そして、いよいよ白亜の宮殿の修復くぽ！
バヌバヌ族やグナース族の技術も取り入れて、
必ずやり抜いてみせるくぽ！
